tool_description: Stories From Canada's Indigenous Residential School Survivors as an API. It gives you to access videos of their experiences with their names and residential school.
title: Survivors

api_list.name: Get All Survivor Stories
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all survivor stories in the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://survivors.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "survivors.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
